page.title: 10FIELDS AND FOOTPATHS (SQ.11)
page.content:
One of the features of this part of the area is the amalgamation of fields , even since the last survey in 1978. The farmers want to increase field size for economy of working and to minimise unusable areas.
Those concerned with {conservation , however, think otherwise.
Also there are attempts to divert and sometimes close footpaths , some of which have been there for centuries. Again,the many{ramblers}do not approve and fight to keep open all rights of way.
Thankfully, they are winning.
